comments.author: lila@panties.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 567670
Old-and-new-Navaway.jpg

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

Nothing, Navaway customized message stopped appearing after a recent Mozilla 6 update.


Actual results:

 "Are you sure you want to leave this page? Complete your purchase now and receive 10% off your next order" has become simply ""This page is asking you to confirm you want to leave". No personalization of Navaway appears on Mozilla 6 any longer, and it cannot be configured to show customized message. We use Navaway on the secure check out page for panties.com, a lingerie site. 


Expected results:

Our customized "Complete your purchase now and receive 10% off your next order" should have appeared in Navaway on Secure check out page. Our site is panties.com, a lingerie site. It worked until about 1 or 2 weeks ago. It still works in other browsers (e.g., Internet Explorer).

Actual results:

 "Are you sure you want to leave this page? Complete your purchase now and receive 10% off your next order" has become simply ""This page is asking you to confirm you want to leave". No personalization of Navaway appears on Mozilla 6 any longer, and it cannot be configured to show customized message. We use Navaway on the secure check out page for panties.com, a lingerie site. 


Expected results:

Our customized "Complete your purchase now and receive 10% off your next order" should have appeared in Navaway on Secure check out page. Our site is panties.com, a lingerie site. It worked until about 1 or 2 weeks ago. It still works in other browsers (e.g., Internet Explorer).

comments.raw_text:
Under steps to reproduce, I thought you asked what we had done to make this happen. (nothing)

To reproduce the problem, simply put an item in the cart, go to Secure Check Out page, and then try to leave the page. 

We hope someone can get back to us.

Lila@panties.com
